summary: This bill, the Asylum for Farmers and Refugees In Krsis And Necessary Emigration Resettlement Act (AFRIKANER Act), designates certain residents of South Africa as Priority 2 refugees of special humanitarian concern. Specifically, it focuses on members of the Caucasian minority group who have experienced persecution due to race, ethnicity, or ancestry. The bill outlines the application process, exclusion from numerical limitations, reporting requirements for the Secretary of State and Homeland Security, and clarifies that those granted refugee status satisfy requirements for admission to the US. It aims to facilitate the resettlement of these individuals.
